definition[0]: if a subject or event comes alive, it becomes interesting and seems real
example[0]: Hopefully, we can make history come alive for the children.
definition[1]: if someone comes alive, they suddenly become happy and interested in what is happening
example[1]: She only came alive when she sat down at the piano.
definition[2]: if a town, city etc comes alive, it becomes busy
example[2]: seaside resorts that come alive in the summer
